00614 
00615       class LockedV {
00616          public:
00617          LockedV( uint32 majV, uint32 mioV, uint32 minV ) 
00618             : majorV( majV ), minorV( mioV ), miniV( minV ) {}
00619 
00620 
00621          bool operator < ( const LockedV& o ) const {
00622             if ( majorV != o.majorV ) {
00623                return majorV < o.majorV;
00624             } else if ( minorV != o.minorV ) {
00625                return minorV < o.minorV;
00626             } else {
00627                return miniV < o.miniV;
00628             }
00629          }
00630 
00631 
00632          uint32 majorV;
00633          uint32 minorV;
00634          uint32 miniV;
00635       };
00636 
00637 
00638       typedef map< LockedV, MC2String > lockedVersionMap;
00639       
00640 
00644       lockedVersionMap m_lockedVersions;

00951 class ClientSettingLessComp {
00952    public:
00956       bool operator() ( const ClientSetting* a,
00957                         const ClientSetting* b ) const
00958       {
00959          return StringUtility::strcmp( a->getClientType(), 
00960                                        b->getClientType() ) < 0;
00961       }
00962 
00963 
00967       bool operator() ( const ClientSetting& a,
00968                         const ClientSetting& b ) const
00969       {
00970          return StringUtility::strcmp( a.getClientType(), 
00971                                        b.getClientType() ) < 0;
00972       }
00973 };
